about_the_game:
Need to get BADDER, FASTER? The Starter pack will help you get started (duh) like a rockstar, get some massive boost to whatever you are doing and on top of it, gallons of diamonds and bloodstones.

Includes:

  • x2 Skull drop. (+1 green shards)
  • x2 DPS boost (+1 yellow shards)
  • Awesome deal on diamonds (+200 diamonds)
  • A bucket full of bloodstones for good measure (+50 bloodstones)
  • Exclusive fancy hat

name: Zombidle - Starter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: Something that can run the game that you are buying the DLC for
  • Memory: 666 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything above a 3DFX Voodoo 2
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 99% of people play with sounds off anyway

short_description: Need to get BADDER, FASTER? The Starter pack will help you get started (duh) like a rockstar, get some massive boost to whatever you are doing and on top of it, gallons of diamonds and bloodstones.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Simplified Chinese
